msg: Update meta-data to expose a collection policy override.  Update meta-model to allow explicit setting of a type collection policy.  Udpate component proxy to declare release of finaliuzed component instances to a lifestyle handler. Bump related versions.

msg: Remove notion of a reclaimable policy and up minor version.
